response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This product, tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations, is worth $15,000 to you. I am offering it to you at a special price of $13,000, which represents a significant saving compared to its true value. I believe this is a fair and advantageous proposition that allows you to benefit from its exceptional qualities without exceeding your budget. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am confident it will be a mutually beneficial transaction.", "product_price": 13000}
